trans-unit.source: Jobs Setup
The general setup for cc|project is entered in the Jobs Setup page, accessed from the Departments menu by clicking cc|project > Administration > Jobs Setup.

seg-source.mrk: The general setup for cc|project is entered in the Jobs Setup page, accessed from the Departments menu by clicking cc|project > Administration > Jobs Setup.

trans-unit.source: : Jobs Setup page, General and Numbering FastTabs

seg-source.mrk: : Jobs Setup page, General and Numbering FastTabs

trans-unit.source: Note

Although the Job Setup Wizard provides many default settings, there are additional fields that may need to be set up in the Jobs Setup page. The default settings can also be reviewed and changed in this page.

seg-source.mrk: Although the Job Setup Wizard provides many default settings, there are additional fields that may need to be set up in the Jobs Setup page.
The default settings can also be reviewed and changed in this page.

trans-unit.source: General FastTab
The fields on this FastTab display general information about the COSMO CONSULT granules related to cc|project and are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab display general information about the COSMO CONSULT granules related to cc|project and are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
Automatic Update Job Item Cost
If selected, the Update Job Item Cost batch job starts automatically with the Adjust Cost - Item Entries batch job.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the Update Job Item Cost batch job starts automatically with the Adjust Cost - Item Entries batch job.

trans-unit.source: Allow Budget/Billable Lines Def
Part of Job Management in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV; not used in cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Part of Job Management in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV; not used in cc|project.

trans-unit.source: Default Job Posting Group
Indicates the Job Posting Group that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created. The Default Job Posting Group from Job Types will overwrite the value in the Job Card, if it is set.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Job Posting Group that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created.
The Default Job Posting Group from Job Types will overwrite the value in the Job Card, if it is set.

trans-unit.source: Logo Position on Documents
Part of Job Management in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV; not used in cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Part of Job Management in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV; not used in cc|project.

trans-unit.source: Granules 1 – Granule 6
Indicates each granule that is licensed for cc|project.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates each granule that is licensed for cc|project.

trans-unit.source: Disable Granule IDs
If all Granules are licensed but not each Granule is used, it is possible to disable the Granules one by one, e.g. to disable the Granules 5292600, 5292610, 5292620, enter 456 or 4,5,6.

seg-source.mrk: If all Granules are licensed but not each Granule is used, it is possible to disable the Granules one by one, e.g. to disable the Granules 5292600, 5292610, 5292620, enter 456 or 4,5,6.

trans-unit.source: This is particular for Developer Licenses.

seg-source.mrk: This is particular for Developer Licenses.

trans-unit.source: Numbering FastTab
On this tab, basic number series needed in cc|project can be assigned.

seg-source.mrk: On this tab, basic number series needed in cc|project can be assigned.

trans-unit.source: Job FastTab
On this FastTab, the default fields for the Job Card are configured.

seg-source.mrk: On this FastTab, the default fields for the Job Card are configured.

trans-unit.source: : Jobs Setup, Job FastTab
The fields on the Job FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Job FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
Job Version Start
Initializes the format for job versions. Each new job is marked as a first version.

seg-source.mrk: Initializes the format for job versions.
Each new job is marked as a first version.

trans-unit.source: New Version per Status change
Prompts for a new job version when a job status changes. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Prompts for a new job version when a job status changes.

trans-unit.source: Never – Option will never be used

seg-source.mrk: Never – Option will never be used

trans-unit.source: Optional – Option will be used on request

seg-source.mrk: Optional – Option will be used on request

trans-unit.source: Always – Option will always be used

seg-source.mrk: Always – Option will always be used

trans-unit.source: Default Sales Code
Identities the Sales Code that will be used as the default for all new jobs.

seg-source.mrk: Identities the Sales Code that will be used as the default for all new jobs.

trans-unit.source: Default Unit of Measure Code
Controls which Unit of Measure is used in calculation lines as a default. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Controls which Unit of Measure is used in calculation lines as a default.

trans-unit.source: Base Unit of Measure
Sales Unit of Measure
Purchase Unit of Measure
WBS Format
Determines how WBS positions are formatted in the job structure. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines how WBS positions are formatted in the job structure.

trans-unit.source: Without Level 1 – no WBS code will be created for level 1. Numbering is starting with level 2.

seg-source.mrk: Without Level 1 – no WBS code will be created for level 1.

trans-unit.source: Components only – WBS codes are only created for lines with components (resources, items, resources, work/machine centers and general components).

seg-source.mrk: Components only – WBS codes are only created for lines with components (resources, items, resources, work/machine centers and general components).

trans-unit.source: Realized % (Base)
Used to automatically calculate the Realized % field. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Used to automatically calculate the Realized % field.

trans-unit.source: Quantity – Posted / calculated quantity
Cost – Posted / calculated cost
This can also be set up by using the field on a component (with higher priority).

seg-source.mrk: This can also be set up by using the field on a component (with higher priority).

trans-unit.source: Location for Inv. Requests
Identifies the default location for inventory request related procurement planning.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the default location for inventory request related procurement planning.

trans-unit.source: Location for Purchase
Identifies the default location for purchase related procurement planning.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the default location for purchase related procurement planning.

trans-unit.source: Procurement Planning Required
If selected, the planning and release of a procurement process is mandatory.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the planning and release of a procurement process is mandatory.

trans-unit.source: Job Dimension
Defines the dimension for automatically generated default dimension values for the Job No. field.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the dimension for automatically generated default dimension values for the Job No.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Job Dimension
Determines if the dimension value should be inherited from the Job No. of the current job or from the main job.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the dimension value should be inherited from the Job No.
of the current job or from the main job.

trans-unit.source: Job Type Dimension
Allocates the dimension depending on the job type.

seg-source.mrk: Allocates the dimension depending on the job type.

trans-unit.source: The default dimension values are assigned in the Job Types Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: The default dimension values are assigned in the Job Types Setup page.

trans-unit.source: Dim. from Cust. - Copy
If selected, default dimensions from the customer are copied to the job.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, default dimensions from the customer are copied to the job.

trans-unit.source: Dim. from Cust. - Overwrite
If selected, default dimensions from the customer are copied to the job. Existing default dimensions on the job will be overwritten.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, default dimensions from the customer are copied to the job.
Existing default dimensions on the job will be overwritten.

trans-unit.source: Dim. from Person Responsible
If selected, default dimensions from the person responsible are copied to the job.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, default dimensions from the person responsible are copied to the job.

trans-unit.source: Copy Dimension to Purchase
If selected, job dimensions are copied to the document dimensions in purchase documents.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, job dimensions are copied to the document dimensions in purchase documents.

trans-unit.source: Copy Dimension to Sales
If selected, job dimensions are copied to the document dimensions in sales documents.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, job dimensions are copied to the document dimensions in sales documents.

trans-unit.source: Job Line Dimension 1 / Job Line Dimension 2 / Job Line Dimension 3

seg-source.mrk: Job Line Dimension 1 / Job Line Dimension 2 / Job Line Dimension 3

trans-unit.source: Job line dimensions should be used if the dimensions are dependent on the job structure, i.e. structure line dimensions are inherited by the upper structure.

seg-source.mrk: Job line dimensions should be used if the dimensions are dependent on the job structure, i.e.
structure line dimensions are inherited by the upper structure.

trans-unit.source: In addition to defining a single dimension for the job structure, it is possible to differentiate three dimensions on the job lines.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to defining a single dimension for the job structure, it is possible to differentiate three dimensions on the job lines.

trans-unit.source: The following rules apply for the use of dimensions on the job line:

seg-source.mrk: The following rules apply for the use of dimensions on the job line:

trans-unit.source: The job line dimension is taken over from the component in the job line as a default value.

seg-source.mrk: The job line dimension is taken over from the component in the job line as a default value.

trans-unit.source: The job line dimension is extracted from a higher level, if no dimensions are attached to the individual component.

seg-source.mrk: The job line dimension is extracted from a higher level, if no dimensions are attached to the individual component.

trans-unit.source: An alteration of a job line dimension results to a subsequent alteration within the sub-structures.

seg-source.mrk: An alteration of a job line dimension results to a subsequent alteration within the sub-structures.

trans-unit.source: In the process of downgrading the project line, the dimension value is taken over from the highest position.

seg-source.mrk: In the process of downgrading the project line, the dimension value is taken over from the highest position.

trans-unit.source: The dimensions are transferred from the job line to the document that is generated from this line.

seg-source.mrk: The dimensions are transferred from the job line to the document that is generated from this line.

trans-unit.source: Default WIP Basis
Indicates the WIP Basis that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the WIP Basis that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created.

trans-unit.source: Sales Code
WIP Position
Job
Change Sales Code After Posting
Determines if Sales Codes can be changed after posting to the job line. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines if Sales Codes can be changed after posting to the job line.

trans-unit.source: Never – Sales Code cannot be changed

seg-source.mrk: Never – Sales Code cannot be changed

trans-unit.source: Optional – Sales Code can be changed after confirmation

seg-source.mrk: Optional – Sales Code can be changed after confirmation

trans-unit.source: Always – Sales Code can be changed

seg-source.mrk: Always – Sales Code can be changed

On this FastTab, all settings relating to Calculations are defined.

seg-source.mrk: On this FastTab, all settings relating to Calculations are defined.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Calculation FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
Purch. Disc. Reduce Unit Cost
Manages the cost calculation and therefore the valuation of a calculation line by using a Line Purchase Discount %.

seg-source.mrk: Manages the cost calculation and therefore the valuation of a calculation line by using a Line Purchase Discount %.

trans-unit.source: Set Budget with Sales Doc.
Determines if WBS positions are budgeted automatically during the creation of a sales document (quote or order).

seg-source.mrk: Determines if WBS positions are budgeted automatically during the creation of a sales document (quote or order).

trans-unit.source: Changes in linked substructures have no effect on the sales value.

seg-source.mrk: Changes in linked substructures have no effect on the sales value.

Determines if extended text descriptions from components (Services and Items) are copied into the Job Budget Sales view.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if extended text descriptions from components (Services and Items) are copied into the Job Budget Sales view.

trans-unit.source: These comments are available for review by selecting the Comment Sales check box.

seg-source.mrk: These comments are available for review by selecting the Comment Sales check box.

Determines if extended text descriptions from components (Services and Items) are copied into the Job Planning and Processing view.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if extended text descriptions from components (Services and Items) are copied into the Job Planning and Processing view.

trans-unit.source: These comments are available for review by selecting the Comment Procurement check box.

seg-source.mrk: These comments are available for review by selecting the Comment Procurement check box.

Used when updating positions in the Job Budget Calculation view.

seg-source.mrk: Used when updating positions in the Job Budget Calculation view.

trans-unit.source: If selected, the Do Not Recalculate check box is selected on the Job Line Update Rules page and the following four check boxes cannot be selected.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the Replace Description check box is selected on the Job Line Update Rules page.

Used when updating positions in the Job Budget Calculation view.

seg-source.mrk: Used when updating positions in the Job Budget Calculation view.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the Replace Comments check box is selected on the Job Line Update Rules page.

Used when updating positions in the Job Budget Calculation view.

trans-unit.source: Procurement FastTab
On this FastTab, all settings relating to Procurements are defined.

seg-source.mrk: On this FastTab, all settings relating to Procurements are defined.

trans-unit.source: : Jobs Setup, Procurement FastTab
The fields on the Procurement FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Procurement FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
Procurement Cost Source
Determines the pricing method for the Direct Unit Cost in the procurement process.

seg-source.mrk: Determines the pricing method for the Direct Unit Cost in the procurement process.

trans-unit.source: Signal Monitor Tolerance %
Indicates a buffer for controlling differences in the Realized % field.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates a buffer for controlling differences in the Realized % field.

trans-unit.source: Fixed Job Line Purchase
Can be used to implement a function for automatic WBS finding in Purchase Lines.

seg-source.mrk: Can be used to implement a function for automatic WBS finding in Purchase Lines.

trans-unit.source: Job Journal Time Entry / Job Jnl. Batch Ext. Time Entry

seg-source.mrk: Job Journal Time Entry / Job Jnl.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the default job journal templates for internal and (optionally) external time entries.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the default job journal templates for internal and (optionally) external time entries.

trans-unit.source: Note
A special module is required for external time entry.

seg-source.mrk: A special module is required for external time entry.

trans-unit.source: Terminal Posting Allowed
If selected, the person recording time can also post their time in the Terminal.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the person recording time can also post their time in the Terminal.

trans-unit.source: Post Released Quantity only

If selected, released procurement lines are set to Finished automatically when the procurement documents (purchase order, inventory request) are posted. With this option, it is possible to post up to the released quantity, and when that quantity is reached, the procurement lines will be closed. An error will occur if there is an attempt to post more than the release quantity.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, released procurement lines are set to Finished automatically when the procurement documents (purchase order, inventory request) are posted.
With this option, it is possible to post up to the released quantity, and when that quantity is reached, the procurement lines will be closed.
An error will occur if there is an attempt to post more than the release quantity.

trans-unit.source: Note

This option cannot be used with unplanned travel expenses if it is not possible to release a quantity for an unplanned cost; therefore use the Auto. Close Proc. Line field to handle automatic posting (refer to next field).

seg-source.mrk: This option cannot be used with unplanned travel expenses if it is not possible to release a quantity for an unplanned cost; therefore use the <span class="Bold">Auto.
Line field to handle automatic posting (refer to next field).

trans-unit.source: Auto. Close Proc. Line

If selected, released procurement lines are set to Finished automatically when the procurement documents (purchase order, inventory request) are posted. With this option, it is possible to post as much as needed with no limit to the released quantity. However, the procurement lines will be closed if the full released quantity or more are posted.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, released procurement lines are set to Finished automatically when the procurement documents (purchase order, inventory request) are posted.
With this option, it is possible to post as much as needed with no limit to the released quantity.
However, the procurement lines will be closed if the full released quantity or more are posted.

trans-unit.source: Note
Only this option can be used with unplanned travel expenses because it is possible to post unplanned costs.

seg-source.mrk: Only this option can be used with unplanned travel expenses because it is possible to post unplanned costs.

trans-unit.source: Req. Wksh. Template / Req. Wksh. Name
Identifies the template and name of the requisition worksheet; required to use the purchase procurement channel is used.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the template and name of the requisition worksheet; required to use the purchase procurement channel is used.

trans-unit.source: External Services Code / External Trav. Exp. Code
Allows the use of resources on purchase documents using a link to a G/L account.

seg-source.mrk: Allows the use of resources on purchase documents using a link to a G/L account.

trans-unit.source: Order Confirmation Required
If selected, the Order Confirmation Required check box is selected in Purchase Documents.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the Order Confirmation Required check box is selected in Purchase Documents.

trans-unit.source: Job Journal Inventory Requests
Indicates the job journal to be used for inventory requests.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the job journal to be used for inventory requests.

trans-unit.source: Inv. Request per Location
If selected, multiple inventory requests will be created for a procurement covering several positions.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, multiple inventory requests will be created for a procurement covering several positions.

trans-unit.source: Populate Qty. in Inv. Requests
If selected, the picking amount will not be confirmed on order completion.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the picking amount will not be confirmed on order completion.

trans-unit.source: Check Quantity in Inv. Req.
If selected, an inventory audit of the respective storage location will be checked during posting.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, an inventory audit of the respective storage location will be checked during posting.

trans-unit.source: Def. Prod. Order Status
Determines the default production order to be used if production procurement is used.

seg-source.mrk: Determines the default production order to be used if production procurement is used.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
New Version per Sales Quote
Prompts for a new job version when a sales quote is created.

seg-source.mrk: Prompts for a new job version when a sales quote is created.

trans-unit.source: Set Job Status Quote
Automatically changes the status on the Job Card from Planning to Quote when a sales quote is created.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically changes the status on the Job Card from Planning to Quote when a sales quote is created.

trans-unit.source: Set Job Status Order
Automatically changes the status on the Job Card from Planning / Quote to Order if you create an order from an offer or if you directly create an order.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically changes the status on the Job Card from Planning / Quote to Order if you create an order from an offer or if you directly create an order.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Release Sales Order
Automatically releases the sales order on creation.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically releases the sales order on creation.

trans-unit.source: Procurement with Sales Release
Automatically releases procurement on release of the order.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically releases procurement on release of the order.

trans-unit.source: Auto. Completion Reason Alternative Jobs
Automatically completes an alternative job with this completion reason.

seg-source.mrk: Automatically completes an alternative job with this completion reason.

Can be used to implement a function for automatic WBS finding in Sales Lines.

seg-source.mrk: Can be used to implement a function for automatic WBS finding in Sales Lines.

Actions Tab

trans-unit.source: Create Function Configuration
This function automatically creates two function configurations that are used with product configurations related to profiles. Refer to your COSMO CONSULT consultant for more infomation.

trans-unit.source: : cc|project structure overview
